metadata.title: CVE-2020-10809 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HDF5 through 1.12.0. A heap-based buffer overflow exists in the function Decompress() located in decompress.c. It can be triggered by sending a crafted file to the gif2h5 binary. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
